summary: Spanish Language Consistency Testing - ALL PASSED. Verified all Link Student form and textbook ordering workflow texts display correctly in Spanish (es locale). All form labels, select options, placeholders, toast messages, and badges properly localized.

issues: Minor React warning - Each child in list should have unique key prop in Unatienda render method (pre-existing)

passed_tests: Student number label displays 'Numero de Estudiante (opcional)' (Spanish)
Grade options show Spanish labels: '1er Grado', '2do Grado', '3er Grado', etc.
Relationship options show Spanish labels: 'Padre/Madre', 'Tutor Legal', 'Abuelo/a', 'Representante', 'Otro'
Validation toast displays 'Ingrese el nombre del estudiante' (Spanish)
Validation toast displays 'Ingrese el apellido del estudiante' (Spanish)
Success toast displays 'Estudiante vinculado. Pendiente de aprobacion.' (Spanish)
Info message displays 'Tus solicitudes están pendientes de aprobación.' (Spanish)
translations.js contains Spanish orderError: 'Error al enviar el pedido'
translations.js contains Spanish selectAtLeastOne: 'Selecciona al menos un libro'

RELATIONSHIP_OPTIONS in SchoolTextbooksView.jsx correctly uses object format with en/es/zh properties
InlineStudentForm correctly uses lang prop to select appropriate translations
Validation messages in vt object (lines 87-92) are properly localized for es/en/zh
Form texts object (lines 144-148) correctly has es translations with Spanish placeholders 'Juan' and 'Perez'
PendingStudentCard correctly accepts lang prop and displays 'Pendiente' in Spanish
schoolTxbTranslations in translations.js has complete es translations including orderError and selectAtLeastOne

context_for_next_testing_agent: All Spanish translations for Link Student form and textbook ordering workflow are working correctly. The i18n fix properly uses language-aware translations. GRADE_OPTIONS and RELATIONSHIP_OPTIONS use en/es/zh object format. All validation toasts, success toasts, form labels, placeholders, and badges display in Spanish when the user locale is 'es'. No English text found where Spanish should be displayed.
